name: Uni√≥ de Federacions Esportives de Catalunya
goal:
Boost high level federal and school sport.
Take care of updating the sport equipment official list.
Establish necessary risk coverage mechanisms which guarantee security.
Boost the international and collaborative relations with other entities.
Foster job opportunities for high level sport people and social groups at risk of social exclusion.
Keep and coordinate federal sports with clubs and federation at all levels.
Coordinate school sport activities with school sports associations.
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Sport, Youth

sport policies
